name: John Harvey BATES, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION PAROLE, Appellees
name_abbreviation: Bates v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation Parole

parties: John Harvey BATES, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION PAROLE, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 24th day of July, 2003, probable jurisdiction is noted and the order appealed is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
834 A.2d 486
John Harvey BATES, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION PAROLE, Appellees.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
July 24, 2003.
